text: Eduard Nikolayevich Mudrik (; July 18, 1939 in Starobilsk – March 27, 2017 in Moscow)Ушёл из жизни Эдуард Мудрик was a Soviet Russian footballer. He earned 8 caps for the USSR national football team. ==Other websites== * Profile (in Russian) ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Moscow Category:Russian footballers
title: Eduard Mudrik
